category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOMExcludeFromPackCheck
preference.preference_description: Defines which attributes are ignored during the default pack check. For example, set this preference to seqno to allow the exclusion of find numbers from the BOM line pack check. Valid Values: seqno - Excludes find numbers from the BOM line pack check. Allows BOM lines with distinct find numbers to be packed. none - No attributes are ignored during the default pack check. BOM lines must have the same part number and the find number to be packed.

category.name: NX
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_Foreign_Datasets
preference.preference_description: Specifies the non-NX dataset types available to NX when it lists the datasets in an item revision.Specifying dataset types in this preference only makes the dataset types available to NX, it does not enable the application to read the dataset type. Valid Values: The value format is four values with each value separated by a semicolon. The actual values are based on these keywords: DatasetType;NamedReference;NamedReferenceFormat;NamedReferenceTemplate DatasetType is the extension for files of that type. NamedReference is the extension for files of that type. NamedReferenceFormat is the extension for files of that type. Valid values are BINARY or TEXT. NamedReferenceTemplate is the extension for files of that type. For example: DirectModel;JTPART;BINARY;jt For example: SE PART;SE-Part;BINARY;par The values are case sensitive and all of the entry must be included on one line for each dataset type.

preference.name: TC_NX_allow_attrsync_master_with_item
preference.preference_description: Use with attribute synchronization functionality. Determines whether Teamcenter allows synchronization of UGMASTER attributes mapped to item-level properties from Teamcenter Integration for NX to Teamcenter.By default, attributes mapped to the properties of the Item Master form attached to item objects (not item revisions) will synchronize from Teamcenter to Teamcenter Integration for NX; but not in the reverse direction. These attributes are read-only in Teamcenter Integration for NX after the first execution of the NX Save command from the Teamcenter Integration for NX application.Permitting mapping in the reverse direction (Teamcenter Integration for NX to Teamcenter) allows mapping attributes to the properties of the Item Master form stored at the item level. This must not be done. Mapping at the item level may result in loss of data and/or the appearance of incorrect data. Valid Values: YES - Attributes mapped to the properties of the Item Master form will synchronize bidirectionally between Teamcenter Integration for NX and Teamcenter.This mapping allows multiple item revision objects (Rev/A, Rev/B, Rev/C, and so on) to overwrite the values stored on the Item Master form at the item level. Mappings at the item level may result in loss of data and/or the appearance of incorrect data. NO - Attributes mapped to the properties of the Item Master form will synchronize only from Teamcenter to Teamcenter Integration for NX.

preference.name: TC_NX_DataExchange_Dataset_Preferences
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of dataset properties used by NX translators to import/export non-NX files from/to Teamcenter. All the file extensions supported by the translator need to be mentioned separately along with workflow such as import or export.During export, based on the user options if the translation results in multiple files then these files are zipped together and zip file is uploaded to dataset.For example, exporting NX assembly with external references to STEP.

category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_DefaultCreateTypes
preference.preference_description: Define the types to be displayed in the "Create" dialog in the Active Workspace Client (AWC). Valid values are types internal names. All subtypes associated to a provided type will also be displayed.

preference.name: AWS_allowedTypesForDelete
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of Business Object types for which the "Delete" command is visible.

preference.name: AW_FullTextSearch_TypeCategories
preference.preference_description: Contains the list of categories of types

preference.name: AWS_SearchPreFilter_Property2
preference.preference_description: Contains the required information needed to display the second pre-filter in the Search panel of the Active Workspace. Valid values are in the format: * The first value is the type and property internal names in the format "type.property" (e.g. "WorkspaceObject.object_type"). * The second value onwards is the internal values for the property (e.g. "ItemRevision").

preference.name: AWC_Enable_RedLine_feature
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether the "Show Redlines" feature is available or not in the Active Workspace client. This feature provides a way to compare the current object with the configured object. By default, this feature is disabled however applications can turn it on.

category.name: Business Modeler
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ASSIGNED_ITEM_ID_MODIFIABLE
preference.preference_description: Determines whether an automatically generated Item ID can be modified by users after it has been generated. Valid Values: 0 - When the Item ID is generated by clicking the Assign button, the system generated Item ID cannot be modified by the user. 1 - When the Item ID is generated by clicking the Assign button, the system generated Item ID can be modified by the user.

preference.name: ASSIGNED_ITEM_REV_MODIFIABLE
preference.preference_description: Determines whether an automatically generated Item Revision ID can be modified by users after it has been generated. Valid Values: 0 - When the Item Revision ID is generated by clicking the Assign button, the system generated Item Revision ID cannot be modified by the user. 1 - When the Item Revision ID is generated by clicking the Assign button, the system generated Item Revision ID can be modified by the user.

preference.name: AWS_FullTextSearch_Index_Dataset_File_Content
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether to process or skip dataSet file content indexing. Valid values are true or false. Default value is false.

category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: SP5PartEngRevision_default_workflow_template
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default workflow template for Parts for submitting them for Release.

preference.name: SP5PrDesNXRevision_default_workflow_template
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default workflow template for Design items for submitting them for Release.

preference.name: SP5AbsDocRevision_default_workflow_template
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default workflow template for Documents for submitting them for Release.

preference.name: WRKFLW_show_non_condition_templates
preference.preference_description: Controls the results of Condition based Workflow Template filtering shown in the Workflow create/submit panels, specifically whether we show or hide Workflow Templates that have no associated BMIDE Condition filter. Valid Values: * true: Show workflow templates on which condition is not defined. * false: Hide workflow templates on which condition is not defined. This is default value.

preference.name: WRKFLW_show_non_condition_templates
preference.preference_description: Controls the results of Condition based Workflow Template filtering shown in the Workflow create/submit panels, specifically whether we show or hide Workflow Templates that have no associated BMIDE Condition filter. Valid Values: * true: Show workflow templates on which condition is not defined. * false: Hide workflow templates on which condition is not defined. This is default value.

preference.name: CR_allow_alternate_procedures
preference.preference_description:
Manages the visibility of workflow templates in the "New Process" panel of the Workflow application in the rich client. Valid Values: * any : The "All" option is pre-selected in the "All/Assigned" radio button group, which means that all templates are listed. * Assigned: The "Assigned" option is pre-selected in the "All/Assigned" radio button group, which means that only the templates assigned to the group and selected target object type are listed. This is the default value. * none: The options "All/Assigned" are not visible. Furthermore, only the templates assigned to the group and selected target object type are displayed (behaviour similar to the "Assigned" option). When no templates are assigned for the target group/type, the displayed list is empty. If no object was selected when initiating the workflow, all the templates assigned to the group are listed.
Process templates assigned to a group and a target object type are defined through the "Process designer->Edit->Template Filter" command.
